Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.rx

Class RxDiscoveryEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.rx.RxEvent<T>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.rx.RxManagerEvent<com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent>
        • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.rx.RxDiscoveryEvent
  • public final class RxDiscoveryEvent
extends RxManagerEvent<com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent>
    Convenience class used when scanning with RxBleManager.scan(ScanOptions). This simply holds the DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent returned from the scan with some convenience methods.

      Forwards DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.was(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle).
      boolean wasDiscovered()
      Returns true if the RxDiscoveryEvent was for the RxBleDevice being discovered for the first time.
      boolean wasRediscovered()
      Returns true if the RxDiscoveryEvent was for the RxBleDevice getting re-discovered.

      This just calls DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.was(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle) using DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle.UNDISCOVERED

    • Method Detail

      • wasDiscovered

        public final boolean wasDiscovered()
        Returns true if the RxDiscoveryEvent was for the RxBleDevice being discovered for the first time. This just calls DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.was(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle) using DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle.DISCOVERED

      • wasRediscovered

        public final boolean wasRediscovered()
        Returns true if the RxDiscoveryEvent was for the RxBleDevice getting re-discovered. This just calls DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.was(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle) using DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle.REDISCOVERED

      • wasUndiscovered

        public final boolean wasUndiscovered()
        This just calls DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.was(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle) using DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle.UNDISCOVERED

      • was

        public final boolean was​(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle lifecycle)
        Forwards DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.was(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle).

      • lifeCycle

        public final com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DiscoveryListener.LifeCycle lifeCycle()
        Forwards DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.lifeCycle().

        Forwards DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent.rssi().
